author: jimb
msg: Make node and node version ID's part of the public interface.
Tweak semantics of svn_fs_dir_entries and property list functions.

author: kfogel
msg: (make_error_internal): previous log message had the wrong name for this func

author: kfogel
msg: NOTE: the build appears to be broken right now, although I'm not sure
this change is what breaks it.  Committing anyway, though, because Ben
is remote today and I want to him to be able to help figure out the
build problem.  To see the problem, rerun autogen.sh and configure
(with all the suggested flags), then `make clean', then `make'.
Cleanups to error system, preliminary to making the much-discussed fix
(svn_create_error, svn_create_errorf): allocate in a subpool of pool,
else use child's pool.  Also, change order of arguments to
svn_create_error to match that of svn_create_errorf.  All callers
(svn_quick_wrap_error): make sure allocation happens directly in
